LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Cradle.label: synstruct cradle
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Cradle.description: A specialized workbench that holds the chassis and frame of a synstruct in place while they are under construction. Many synstructs hold fond opinions of these workbenches, regarding them almost like a wellspring of life.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Cradle_Frame.label: synstruct cradle (building)
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Cradle_Frame.descrip: A specialized workbench that holds the chassis and frame of a synstruct in place while they are under construction. Many synstructs hold fond opinions of these workbenches, regarding them almost like a wellspring of life.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_PartWorkbench.label: synstruct parts workbench
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_PartWorkbench.descri: A workbench that holds all equipment needed to make a variety of synstruct parts.
A workbench that holds all equipment needed to make a variety of synstruct parts.
